text: Armistice of Mudros was an armistice between Entente signed on 30 October 1918 in the warship HMS Agamemnon.Karsh, Efraim, Empires of the Sand: The Struggle for Mastery in the Middle East, (Harvard University Press, 2001), 327 Ottoman Empire withdrawn from World War I with this agreement. ==References==
title: Armistice of Mudros
